<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
E-COMMERCE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/11/08/alibaba-gets-ready-share-sale-singles-day?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Alibaba Prefers the Term Self-Partnered Day
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="alibaba's singles day" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTczMjUxMTMwLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">On Monday, Chinese e-commerce leader Alibaba will capitalize on the one thing single people crave more than anything: consumerism.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Welcome to Singles Day</strong>, Alibaba’s annual <a href="https://www.scmp.com/tech/e-commerce/article/3035189/pop-superstar-taylor-swift-helps-alibaba-plug-singles-day-worlds?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">24-hour</a> online shopping extravaganza. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">For a little context, $30 billion worth of goods were sold on Alibaba's platforms last Singles Day, laughing in the face of Cyber Monday’s $7.9 billion in U.S. e-commerce sales. This year, the total value of goods sold on Alibaba platforms is slated to reach $37 billion. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Alibaba goes 110% for Singles Day, which <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/11/08/alibaba-singles-day-2019-preview.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">started</a> as a marketing gimmick in 2009.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Taylor Swift will </span><span><a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-singles-day-alibaba/with-discounts-galore-and-taylor-swift-alibaba-eyes-another-record-singles-day-idUSKBN1XI0T3?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">headline</a></span><span> a Shanghai gala ahead of Singles Day.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Kim Kardashian West did a livestream promoting her beauty line KKW.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Getting those two in the same paragraph should earn Alibaba a Nobel Peace Prize.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>Facing weaker economic growth and a U.S. trade war, China has <a href="https://www.scmp.com/business/companies/article/3033924/alibaba-sets-sights-500-million-consumers-singles-day-shopping?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">relied heavily</a> on consumer spending; retail sales were 60% of Chinese GDP growth in the first half of this year. Alibaba’s benefited, posting a better-than-expected quarter with $16.7 billion in sales.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Wondering how to celebrate?</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Raise $10 billion to $15 billion in a Hong Kong listing. That’s <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/alibaba-readies-up-to-15-billion-hong-kong-listing-11573206995?mod=hp_lead_pos4&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">reportedly Alibaba’s plan</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Asia’s <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-11-08/alibaba-is-said-to-seek-up-to-15-billion-in-h-k-share-sale?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">most valuable</a> public company, which had a record-setting $25 billion NYC listing five years ago, plans to launch the HK share sale <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-alibaba-listing-hongkong-exclusive/exclusive-boon-for-hong-kong-as-alibaba-plans-15-billion-listing-in-late-november-sources-idUSKBN1XI0TL?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">after Singles Day</a>.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>A $10+ billion listing would eclipse Uber’s as the biggest stock offering so far in 2019. Saudi Aramco would like us to emphasize the “so far.”</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Listing in Hong Kong is risky. </strong>The city remains <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/08/business/alibaba-hong-kong-listing.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">highly unstable</a> during pro-democracy protests that sent HK into a <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/31/hong-kong-officially-recession?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">recession</a>. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The Hong Kong stock exchange has handled $19.9 billion worth of IPO deals this year, short of the NYSE’s $25.7 billion and the Nasdaq’s $31.2 billion. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Alibaba went with bright orange for its color scheme—clearly, it’s not afraid of risk.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GEOPOLITICS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/11/08/berlin-wall-fell-30-years-ago?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
What’s the Etiquette on 30th Anniversary of Wall Destruction?
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Fall of the Berlin Wall " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTczMjQ0NTM5LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Stephen Jaffe/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">On this day 30 years ago, a spokesman for the East German Politburo <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/1989/11/10/world/camor-east-berlin-wall-monument-cold-war-triumphs-tragedies.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announced</a> that all German citizens could cross the border dividing East and West Germany—which led to the fall of the Berlin Wall.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The event symbolized the end of the Iron Curtain, or the figurative division (which was literal in Berlin) between the Soviet Union and capitalist, democratic Europe. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What it meant for world history: </strong>the official failure of the Soviet Union’s experiment with authoritarian communism (the USSR collapsed two years after the wall). </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>After that, the new nation of Russia pursued both political and economic liberalism. The Chinese Communist Party was watching and decided that economic openness looked like a good idea...but not so much on democracy. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>As for the united Germany, it’s now Europe’s economic MVP, though it’s </span><span><a href="https://www.ft.com/content/0bc8cfe2-01ff-11ea-b7bc-f3fa4e77dd47?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">flirting</a></span><span> with recession. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">To answer the etiquette question…</strong>Berlin <a href="https://www.thelocal.de/20191104/how-berlin-will-mark-30th-anniversary-of-the-fall-of-the-wall?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">is throwing</a> a seven-day, citywide festival to commemorate the occasion. It features exhibitions including footage of pro-democracy protests and Berliners telling stories of being separated from their families by the wall.</p>

<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e865734bf6f7.jpg">
</a><span>  </span>
<a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Berlin+is+throwing+a+7-day%2C+citywide+festival+to+commemorate+the+occasion&url=https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/11/08/berlin-wall-fell-30-years-ago&via=MorningBrew" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e86576e04837.jpg">
</a><span>  </span>
<a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">
<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e8657887c532.jpg">
</a>
</td>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
VAPING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/11/08/cdc-finally-pinpoints-source-vaping-illnesses?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The CDC Has Smoked Out a Culprit
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">U.S. health officials <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/health/vaping/vaping-illness-breakthrough-points-vitamin-e-oil-cause-cdc-says-n1078781?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">have identified</a> a “potential toxin of concern” in the mystery vaping illness outbreak that’s sickened 2,051 people and killed 39 as of Thursday.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">That potential toxin of concern:</strong> vitamin E acetate. It was found in all 29 patient lung tissue samples officials tested.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>While the CDC didn’t completely rule out other chemicals, it said this one was a “</span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/08/health/vaping-illness-cdc.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">very strong culprit</a></span><span>,” plus no other suspect substances were found in the lung samples.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">That mystery vaping illness outbreak:</strong> <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/11/08/cdc-says-its-made-a-breakthrough-in-finding-possible-cause-of-vaping-illness.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">EVALI</a>, to the scientists studying it. Patients have been found in 49 states, D.C., and the Virgin Islands. About 70% are male, 79% are under 35 years old, and 86% said they have vaped THC, the main psychoactive compound in marijuana.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Vitamin E acetate is an ingredient sometimes added to legal THC-based products. But health experts say many of the vapes used by those who got sick were illicitly obtained.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ While we’re here: </strong>President Trump said Friday he’s <a href="https://apnews.com/af1d33b227894fca955e6b7b72e95131?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pursuing legislation</a> to raise the purchase age for e-cigarettes to 21 from 18.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2019%2F11%2F08%2Fcdc-finally-pinpoints-source-vaping-illnesses" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">

</a><span>  </span>

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e8657887c532.jpg">
</a>
</td>
</tr>
</table>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PRIVATE EQUITY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/11/08/blackstone-buying-bumble-owner?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
You’ve Got a New Match!
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>

<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Bee movie" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=376 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/B2yJKBlQZEp1yL7iuC/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Bee movie" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/B2yJKBlQZEp1yL7iuC/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Private equity giant Blackstone is <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/11/08/tech/bumble-blackstone/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">buying a majority stake</a> in the parent company of dating app Bumble. So...did Bumble founder Whitney Wolfe Herd make the first move? Maybe after Blackstone CEO Stephen Schwarzman super liked her company?</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The details: </strong>Blackstone’s <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/blackstone-takes-controlling-stake-in-owner-of-dating-app-bumble-11573225201?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">multibillion-dollar investment</a> values Bumble parent MagicLab at about $3 billion. As part of the deal, Russian-British billionaire/MagicLab founder Andrey Andreev is selling his stake and leaving the company.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Unlike your recent match asking for coffee instead of drinks, Andreev’s exit means something. In July, <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/angelauyeung/2019/11/08/blackstone-to-buy-russian-billionaires-majority-stake-in-owner-of-dating-app-bumble/#2ab29f0346a8?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Forbes reported</a> allegations of a sexist, misogynistic workplace culture at the London offices of Badoo, the MagicLab-owned dating app Andreev founded.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>That doesn’t play with Bumble’s women-make-the-rules ethos.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Now, Wolfe Herd is taking Andreev’s CEO office at MagicLabs. She’ll keep most of her stake in the company (a </span><span><a href="https://techcrunch.com/2019/11/08/badoos-andrey-andreev-sells-his-stake-in-bumble-to-blackstone-valuing-the-dating-app-at-3b/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">rumored 19%</a></span><span>).</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">For Blackstone</strong>, Bumble & Co. are worth bringing home to mom. The PE firm has been focused on investing in fast-growing companies, and MagicLab is a) profitable b) clocking in annual revenue growth near 40% and c) a likely IPO candidate.</p>

collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOn Monday, Chinese e-commerce leader Alibaba will capitalize on the one thing single people crave more than anything: consumerism.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWelcome to Singles Day\u003c/strong\u003e, Alibaba’s annual \u003ca href=\"https://www.scmp.com/tech/e-commerce/article/3035189/pop-superstar-taylor-swift-helps-alibaba-plug-singles-day-worlds?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e24-hour\u003c/a\u003e online shopping extravaganza. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFor a little context, $30 billion worth of goods were sold on Alibaba's platforms last Singles Day, laughing in the face of Cyber Monday’s $7.9 billion in U.S. e-commerce sales. This year, the total value of goods sold on Alibaba platforms is slated to reach $37 billion. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAlibaba goes 110% for Singles Day, which \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/11/08/alibaba-singles-day-2019-preview.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estarted\u003c/a\u003e as a marketing gimmick in 2009.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eTaylor Swift will \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-singles-day-alibaba/with-discounts-galore-and-taylor-swift-alibaba-eyes-another-record-singles-day-idUSKBN1XI0T3?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eheadline\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e a Shanghai gala ahead of Singles Day.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eKim Kardashian West did a livestream promoting her beauty line KKW.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eGetting those two in the same paragraph should earn Alibaba a Nobel Peace Prize.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture: \u003c/strong\u003eFacing weaker economic growth and a U.S. trade war, China has \u003ca href=\"https://www.scmp.com/business/companies/article/3033924/alibaba-sets-sights-500-million-consumers-singles-day-shopping?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erelied heavily\u003c/a\u003e on consumer spending; retail sales were 60% of Chinese GDP growth in the first half of this year. Alibaba’s benefited, posting a better-than-expected quarter with $16.7 billion in sales.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWondering how to celebrate?\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRaise $10 billion to $15 billion in a Hong Kong listing. That’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/alibaba-readies-up-to-15-billion-hong-kong-listing-11573206995?mod=hp_lead_pos4\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ereportedly Alibaba’s plan\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAsia’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-11-08/alibaba-is-said-to-seek-up-to-15-billion-in-h-k-share-sale?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003emost valuable\u003c/a\u003e public company, which had a record-setting $25 billion NYC listing five years ago, plans to launch the HK share sale \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-alibaba-listing-hongkong-exclusive/exclusive-boon-for-hong-kong-as-alibaba-plans-15-billion-listing-in-late-november-sources-idUSKBN1XI0TL?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eafter Singles Day\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eA $10+ billion listing would eclipse Uber’s as the biggest stock offering so far in 2019. Saudi Aramco would like us to emphasize the “so far.”\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eListing in Hong Kong is risky. \u003c/strong\u003eThe city remains \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/08/business/alibaba-hong-kong-listing.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehighly unstable\u003c/a\u003e during pro-democracy protests that sent HK into a \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/31/hong-kong-officially-recession?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erecession\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe Hong Kong stock exchange has handled $19.9 billion worth of IPO deals this year, short of the NYSE’s $25.7 billion and the Nasdaq’s $31.2 billion. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTczMjQ0NTM5LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eStephen Jaffe/Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOn this day 30 years ago, a spokesman for the East German Politburo \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/1989/11/10/world/camor-east-berlin-wall-monument-cold-war-triumphs-tragedies.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounced\u003c/a\u003e that all German citizens could cross the border dividing East and West Germany—which led to the fall of the Berlin Wall.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe event symbolized the end of the Iron Curtain, or the figurative division (which was literal in Berlin) between the Soviet Union and capitalist, democratic Europe. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhat it meant for world history: \u003c/strong\u003ethe official failure of the Soviet Union’s experiment with authoritarian communism (the USSR collapsed two years after the wall). \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAfter that, the new nation of Russia pursued both political and economic liberalism. The Chinese Communist Party was watching and decided that economic openness looked like a good idea...but not so much on democracy. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eAs for the united Germany, it’s now Europe’s economic MVP, though it’s \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/0bc8cfe2-01ff-11ea-b7bc-f3fa4e77dd47?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eflirting\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e with recession. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eTo answer the etiquette question…\u003c/strong\u003eBerlin \u003ca href=\"https://www.thelocal.de/20191104/how-berlin-will-mark-30th-anniversary-of-the-fall-of-the-wall?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eis throwing\u003c/a\u003e a seven-day, citywide festival to commemorate the occasion. It features exhibitions including footage of pro-democracy protests and Berliners telling stories of being separated from their families by the wall.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS Culprit\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eU.S. health officials \u003ca href=\"https://www.nbcnews.com/health/vaping/vaping-illness-breakthrough-points-vitamin-e-oil-cause-cdc-says-n1078781?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehave identified\u003c/a\u003e a “potential toxin of concern” in the mystery vaping illness outbreak that’s sickened 2,051 people and killed 39 as of Thursday.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThat potential toxin of concern:\u003c/strong\u003e vitamin E acetate. It was found in all 29 patient lung tissue samples officials tested.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eWhile the CDC didn’t completely rule out other chemicals, it said this one was a “\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/08/health/vaping-illness-cdc.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003every strong culprit\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e,” plus no other suspect substances were found in the lung samples.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThat mystery vaping illness outbreak:\u003c/strong\u003e \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/11/08/cdc-says-its-made-a-breakthrough-in-finding-possible-cause-of-vaping-illness.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eEVALI\u003c/a\u003e, to the scientists studying it. Patients have been found in 49 states, D.C., and the Virgin Islands. About 70% are male, 79% are under 35 years old, and 86% said they have vaped THC, the main psychoactive compound in marijuana.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eVitamin E acetate is an ingredient sometimes added to legal THC-based products. But health experts say many of the vapes used by those who got sick were illicitly obtained.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e+ While we’re here: \u003c/strong\u003ePresident Trump said Friday he’s \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/af1d33b227894fca955e6b7b72e95131?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epursuing legislation\u003c/a\u003e to raise the purchase age for e-cigarettes to 21 from 18.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable So...did Bumble founder Whitney Wolfe Herd make the first move? Maybe after Blackstone CEO Stephen Schwarzman super liked her company?\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe details: \u003c/strong\u003eBlackstone’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/blackstone-takes-controlling-stake-in-owner-of-dating-app-bumble-11573225201?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003emultibillion-dollar investment\u003c/a\u003e values Bumble parent MagicLab at about $3 billion. As part of the deal, Russian-British billionaire/MagicLab founder Andrey Andreev is selling his stake and leaving the company.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eUnlike your recent match asking for coffee instead of drinks, Andreev’s exit means something. In July, \u003ca href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/angelauyeung/2019/11/08/blackstone-to-buy-russian-billionaires-majority-stake-in-owner-of-dating-app-bumble/#2ab29f0346a8?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eForbes reported\u003c/a\u003e allegations of a sexist, misogynistic workplace culture at the London offices of Badoo, the MagicLab-owned dating app Andreev founded.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThat doesn’t play with Bumble’s women-make-the-rules ethos.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eNow, Wolfe Herd is taking Andreev’s CEO office at MagicLabs. She’ll keep most of her stake in the company (a \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://techcrunch.com/2019/11/08/badoos-andrey-andreev-sells-his-stake-in-bumble-to-blackstone-valuing-the-dating-app-at-3b/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erumored 19%\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e).\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFor Blackstone\u003c/strong\u003e, Bumble \u0026 Co. are worth bringing home to mom. The PE firm has been focused on investing in fast-growing companies, and MagicLab is a) profitable b) clocking in annual revenue growth near 40% and c) a likely IPO candidate.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!--
